name: s2id
description: Anchorage ID (id of the S2 grid cell).

name: encounters
description: Indicates wether the anchorage is present in product_events_encounter table.

name: loitering
description: Indicates wether the anchorage is present in product_events_loitering table.

name: ais_gaps
description: Indicates wether the anchorage is present in product_events_ais_gap table.
